attributes.action: Ban size zero models from the catwalks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Size zero models provide an unhealthy body image for women and teenagers. We believe that everybody should feel comfortable with however they look, whether it's a size 8 or a size 18. And therefore, we are campaining to ban size zero models.
attributes.creator_name: Miss Olivia Adams and Miss Megan Griffiths
